trends: There have been 12 other sightings in St John
There was one other sighting in St John on or around August 7th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswas looking out my window at the moon and noticed a bright light under the moon in the sky traveling fast in a straight line, first noticed it and turned my cam recorder on that was on my tri pod, was surprised to see that light cause there was nothing else in the sky that early, lost sight of the bright orb because of the angle of my window and because it was travelling at a fast rate of speed.
Summary: looking at the moon at twenty to six in the morning and noticed a bright light moving fast across the sky, set my cam to twilight and recorded what i saw
